Detailed Description

template<class T>
class Array2DReference< T >

Class that implements references to objects of the Array2D template class.

A reference is an Array2D object, that is identified by the flag "stat", which is set to "true".

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<class T>
Array2DReference< T >::~Array2DReference (  )  [inline]

Destroys the current array 2D reference.

It is important to define the destructor, because otherwise Visual C++ wouldn't call the destructors of the base classes.
